name: BOOTY (ZX SPECTRUM 128/+2/+3)
description:
Jim the cabin boy wants to take advantage of the stay of his boat in Port Royal to fulfill his own plans in the future. As bold as he likes, he is ready to keep the 125 pieces of treasure which are distributed by the galleon warehouse and flee as far as possible.

Copyleft (C) 2018

BOOTY
